title: Bug 2512Save As... on OLE editor doesn't let you choose folder (1GFDCRE)
description: Bug 2512Save As... on OLE editor doesn't let you choose folder (1GFDCRE)
OB: new file test.doc it opens Word or Wordpad choose File / Save As it gives you the rename prompter, which only lets you enter a new name, not choose a different folder Save As on an internal editor does let you choose a folderNOTES:
